name: tabBarController(_:interactionControllerFor:)
desc: Called to allow the delegate to return a UIViewControllerInteractiveTransitioning delegate object for use during an animated tab bar transition.
declaration:
optional func tabBarController(_ tabBarController: UITabBarController, 
      interactionControllerFor animationController: UIViewControllerAnimatedTransitioning) -> UIViewControllerInteractiveTransitioning?
